content.text: I hope to go on vacation to Quebec, Canada someday.
That sounds great! I have a lot of family in Canada.
I've never been to Canada before, but I hear it's beautiful.
It's pretty nice. I have to admit, I've only been to Quebec once, but I had a great time.
What's your favorite thing about Quebec?
I would have to say the food. There's a lot of great restaurants there, and the food is really fresh.
I love trying new foods, so I'm sure I'd enjoy it there.
I think you would. There's a lot of variety, so you're sure to find something you like.
Have you ever been to Quebec City?
Yes, I have. It's a beautiful city. The architecture is amazing, and there's a lot of history there.
I've heard good things about Quebec City. I'll have to add it to my list of places to visit.
You definitely should. It's a great city to visit.
